item.description:
23rd Annual Fourth of July Town Celebration

Location: Town Green
Rte. 5
Enfield, CT 06083
Date: July 6-8
Time: Fri. 5 p.m.-midnight, Sat. 10 a.m.-midnight, Sun. 10 a.m.-11 p.m.

Description: Old-fashioned 4th of July celebration with live entertainment, juried craft fair, Taste of Enfield, parade, concerts, children activities, 5K road race,

>>> fireworks on Sun. <<< @ 9:15 PM - I "assume".

Admission: Free.

Phone: (860) 749-1820

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: FIREWORKS - Enfield
